message.content:
1. Patients underwent a clinical examination.
2. Patients had fasting blood samples taken.
3. Patients underwent an adrenocorticotroph hormone (ACTH) test.
4. Patients underwent a 3-h oral glucose tolerance test (OGTT).
5. Patients filled in questionnaires regarding their mental health.
6. Patients filled in questionnaires regarding their health-related quality of life (HRQoL).
7. The questionnaires included the WHO Well-Being Index (WHO-5).
8. The questionnaires included the Major Depression Inventory (MDI).
9. The questionnaires included the Short Form 36 (SF-36).
10. The questionnaires included the PCOS questionnaire.

messages.content:
Statement: Patients underwent clinical examination, fasting blood samples, adrenocorticotroph hormone (ACTH) test, 3-h oral glucose tolerance test (OGTT) and filled in questionnaires regarding mental health and health-related quality of life (HRQoL): WHO Well-Being Index (WHO-5), Major Depression Inventory (MDI), Short Form 36 (SF-36) and PCOS questionnaire.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
